games.title: Cyberpunk 2077
games.description: An open-world, action-adventure story set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power, glamour and body modification.

games.title: Elden Ring
games.description: Rise, Tarnished, and let grace guide thee. A new adventure begins in the Lands Between.

games.title: Starfield
games.description: Explore infinite procedurally generated star systems and create any character you want.

games.title: Baldur's Gate 3
games.description: Gather your party and venture forth in this next-generation RPG set in the Forgotten Realms.

games.title: Hogwarts Legacy
games.description: Experience the wizarding world in the 1800s as a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

games.title: The Legend of Zelda
games.description: Embark on a new adventure in Hyrule and discover what awaits in this sequel to Breath of the Wild.

games.title: Ghost of Tsushima
games.description: Forge your own path as Jin Sakai, a samurai warrior fighting to reclaim Tsushima Island from Mongol invaders.

games.title: Assassin’s Creed Mirage
games.description: Experience the story of Basim, a cunning street thief seeking answers and justice in ninth-century Baghdad.

games.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
games.description: Experience the epic tale of life in America’s unforgiving heartland during the end of the wild west era.

games.title: Alan Wake 2
games.description: A psychological horror experience that blurs the lines between reality and nightmare in a haunting narrative journey.
